code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import TimeAgo from"timeago-react";import ReactMarkdown from"react-markdown";import gfm from"remark-gfm";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{getPost}from"../../../store/store";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PostContent(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();var post_list=useSelector(function(state){return state.postSlice.list;});useEffect(function(){dispatch(getPost(-1));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"px-6 bg-reddit_gray",children:post_list.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border border-reddit_border bg-white p-2 rounded-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"text-reddit_text-darker text-sm mb-1",children:["Posted by u/",item.user_name," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TimeAgo,{datetime:item.post_date})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl mb-3",children:"\uD3EC\uC2A4\uD2B8 \uC81C\uBAA9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-sm leading-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactMarkdown,{plugins:[gfm],children:item.post_content})})]},index);})});}
